title: WC Partners Christmas Celebration [children]
description: Have some holiday cheer cookie decorating, craft, and best yet meet Santa! This event is for children age 15 years and younger. Please RSVP by November 25 with your Support Coordinator or by calling the office.

title: WC Partners Christmas Celebration [adults]
description: Join us at the Marshfield Senior Center for a night of games, crafts, and fun! We will have an ornament exchange, so please bring an ornament if you would like to participate. WC Partners will be hosting food for this event. This event is for adults age 16 years and older. Please RSVP by November 25 with your Support Coordinator or by calling the office.

title: Music Therapy
description: Music Therapy is for everyone! Drury University staff and students provide opportunities for individuals to participate in music therapy. Pre-registration is required. Contact your Support Coordinator for more information.

title: Project STIR
description: Project STIR is a advocacy/self-determination course designed and taught by an advocacy specialist with the Springfield Regional Office. Class registration is full for this session. Contact your Support Coordinator for more information.

title: Internet Safety
description: SCIL/Empower:abilities will be hosting an educational class on Internet Safety.

title: Holiday Craft
description: SCIL/Empower:abilities will be hosting an educational class on Holiday Craft.
